hadiths.text: Jabir b. 'Abdullah said that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) delivered the sermon and said:When any one of you comes for the Friday (prayer) and the Imam comes out (from his apartment), (even then) should observe two rak'ahs (of prayer)

chapter.eng-name: Greeting (prayers upon entering the masjid) while the Imam is preaching
